audioText: Chaque seconde compte quand nous envoyons fraîchement ces lettres urgentes à nos clients.
question: When do we send these urgent letters to our clients?
explanation: The text states 'Chaque seconde compte quand nous envoyons fraîchement ces lettres urgentes à nos clients' - Every second counts when we freshly send these urgent letters to our clients. 'Seconde' means second (time unit), 'envoyons' is first person plural of 'envoyer', and 'fraîchement' means freshly.
